title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.

title: Mitigating Socio-Demographic Bias in Language-Based Machine Learning Models of Depression
description: An end-to-end ML project to classify and estimate depression severity.

title: Comparison of Strategies that Estimate the Probability of Head of a Biased Coin
description: A programmatic approach to study and compare different strategies that estimate the probability of head for a biased coin.

title: CSCI 5922: Deep Learning & Neural Network
description: A collection of all the problem set and lab assignment solutions for the course CSCI 5922: Deep Learning & Neural Network.

title: Census Income Data Analysis
description: Key insights from analyzing 1996 Census Income data from US Census Bureau Resources.

title: QuickRent Rental System
description: An online rental system platform built using React and Flask (part of the course Datacenter Scale Computing)

title: Airflow Podcast Summary
description: A simple data pipeline created using Airflow to download podcasts and generate their summaries.
